about_the_game:
Guide a boy, hide him and escape from the Nazi camp using posters!


Game Description:


Ghostein is an innovative short game 2D platform that combines elements of stealth and emotional narrative to offer a unique and immersive experience. Set during World War II in a Nazi concentration camp, you take on the role of a father's ghost who died in the gas chamber.



Your mission is to guide and protect your son, hiding him from the Nazis and helping him escape the camp using strategically placed posters.


Key Features:
  • Emotional Narrative: The touching story of a father who returns as a ghost to save his son creates an intense and emotional atmosphere.
  • Stealth Gameplay: Use stealth to avoid detection by the Nazis as you guide the boy to freedom.
  • Commands through Posters: Use posters to give commands to the boy and help him stealthily escape the camp, avoiding obstacles.
  • Immersive Retro Atmosphere: Explore environments that recreate the dark, retro atmosphere of a concentration camp.
  • Awards and recognition: Ghostein was awarded Best Narrative at Game Jam Plus and is praised in several reviews for its engaging story and unique gameplay.
By acquiring Ghostein, players can expect an immersive and emotionally impactful experience, combining elements of stealth, deep narrative, and strategic challenges. Get ready for an exciting and intense journey as you guide the main character's son through a dangerous and emotional escape.
